Standard shipping within the UK is £5.

Please allow up to 3 working days for us to prepare your order. We use Royal Mail and process orders Monday - Friday. If you require urgent delivery on your order please get in touch and we’ll be happy to accommodate.

We are not responsible for any shipping delays outside of our control.

Due to limited inventory, all in-store purchases are final sale and not eligible for return or exchange.

Online returns and exchanges can be made on full-priced items and no later than 14 days from the date of receipt.

  • Notify us on contact@studioren.co.uk to receive confirmation of the return.
  • Items must be returned in their original condition and packaging.

We offer worldwide shipping.

Europe: £15 (3-5 working days)

Rest of World: £25 (5-7 working days)

Please note that international orders may be subject to customs duties and taxes, which are the responsibility of the customer.

If you would like to exchange an item for a different size or color, please return the original item for a refund and place a new order.

Exchanges are subject to stock availability. Please contact us at contact@studioren.co.uk for assistance.

Pre-order items are products that are not currently in stock but will be shipped at a future date.

We will provide an estimated shipping date on the product page. Please note that dates are subject to change.

We take pride in our eco-friendly packaging. All orders are wrapped in recyclable paper and shipped in compostable mailers.

If your order is a gift, please leave a note at checkout and we will remove the invoice.
